error.name: DOWNLOAD_ERROR_FILE_ALREADY_EXISTS
error.msg: Failed to rename the downloaded file

error.name: DOWNLOAD_ERROR_TOO_MANY_REDIRECTS
error.msg: Too many redirects from HTTP response header

error.name: DOWNLOAD_ERROR_UNHANDLED_HTTP_CODE
error.msg: The download cannot handle the HTTP status value

error.name: DOWNLOAD_ERROR_REQUEST_TIMEOUT
error.msg: No action after client creates a download ID

error.name: DOWNLOAD_ERROR_RESPONSE_TIMEOUT
error.msg: No call to start API for some time although the download is created

error.name: DOWNLOAD_ERROR_SYSTEM_DOWN
error.msg: No response from client after rebooting download daemon

error.name: DOWNLOAD_ERROR_ID_NOT_FOUND
error.msg: Download ID does not exist in download service module

error.name: DOWNLOAD_ERROR_INVALID_NETWORK_TYPE
error.msg: Network bonding is set but network type is not set as DOWNLOAD_NETWORK_ALL
